text: Serhiy Chobotenko (; born 16 January 1997) is a Ukrainian football centre back. He is currently playing for Ukrainian side FC Mariupol. ==Career== Chobotenko is product of FC Metalurh Zaporizhya youth team system. His first trainer was Mykola Syenovalov. He made his debut for FC Mariupol in the Ukrainian Premier League in an away match against FC Zorya Luhansk on 22 July 2018. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Zaporizhia Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Shakhtar Donetsk players Category:FC Mariupol players Category:Association football defenders
title: Serhiy Chobotenko
